'''Dazzling Moon of Metztli''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Land of Tleyaoyotl]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 140]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Ilhuicatl-Meztli}} is one of the {{w|Thirteen Heavens}} in Aztec mythology. It is ruled by the rain god {{w|Tláloc}}, and one of the gods residing in it is the moon deity {{w|Metztli}}.
